TextAsset.value: (And so, once detention was over, we both took a walk down in the quad.)
H3R3, 1 BROUGHT YOU SOM3TH1NG TO SN4CK ON
This is just a fistful of brightly-colored chalk.
Y34H!
1T’S MY F4VOR1T3 FOR WH3N 1 H4V3 TO TH1NK SOM3TH1NG OV3R
...OR WH3N 1’M JUST PL41N HUNGRY >:]
Um. Thanks, I guess.
1’M SORRY 4BOUT TH3 OTH3R D4Y, COTTON C4NDY
W3LL 4CTU4LLY
1’M NOT SORRY TH4T 1T H4PP3N3D
4NYON3 W1TH H4LF 4 M1ND COULD S33 TH4T TH3 3V3NTS 4S TH3Y UNFOLD3D W3R3 ULT1M4T3LY 1N3V1T4BL3
...Uh huh.
BUT 1 4M SORRY 1 H4D TO B3 TH3 1NSTRUM3NT THROUGH WH1CH YOUR JUST1C3 W4S D3L1V3R3D >:]
4LTHOUGH YOU D1D LOOK 4WFULLY CUT3 SQU1RM1NG 4W4Y DUR1NG YOUR 1NT3RROG4T1ON
Terezi, I-
I don’t get it?
HUH? WH4T DO YOU M34N?
WH4T’S NOT TO G3T?
You do all this mean stuff to me…
You declare me guilty for a crime that I’m pretty sure I didn’t commit…
In fact, I don’t even know what the crime really WAS!
Something to do with your old Scalemate, or something?!
PYR4LSP1T3 >:|
Yeah, him.
But then, you act all… flirty with me?
You call me cutesy nicknames…
You LICK me…
You bring me presents and want to spend time with me…
I have no idea what’s going on!
Can you please just…
Say what’s on your mind?
And not just dance around it?
${slot:playerName}
4R3 YOU R34LLY TH1S D3NS3?!
1… 1 R34LLY F33L TH4T 1 COULD NOT H4V3 B33N MOR3 CL34R 1F 1 TR13D!
M4YB3 YOU JUST DON’T F33L TH3 S4M3?
If… if you’re asking me if I like you…
I mean, kinda, yeah!
But I’m so confused right now…
And kinda scared of you.
I don’t know what to think.
OH
OOOOOOOHH
OH, NO!!!
${slot:playerName} D1D YOU TH1NK TH1S W4S…
4 R3D TH1NG?!
Red?
You mean like your glasses?
NO DUMMY
1 M34N L1K3 R3D-R3D
YOU KNOW, TH3 FLUSH3D QU4DR4NT?
Flushed… quad…?
Is this another one of those times…
Where you say a bunch of stuff I don’t understand…
And then do something really awful to me? :(
OH ${slot:playerName}!
1 THOUGHT YOU UND3RSTOOD!
M4N 1’V3 B33N GO1NG 4BOUT TH1S TOT4LLY TH3 WRONG W4Y >:\
1’M SO SO SORRY!
4ND 1 M34N… R34LLY SORRY
NOT JUST PR3T3ND1NG TO B3 SORRY SO YOU L3T YOUR GU4RD DOWN!
DO YOU NOT H4V3 QU4DR4NTS WH3R3 YOU COM3 FROM?
Um…
I don’t THINK so?
H3R3 1’LL TRY TO K33P TH1S S1MPL3
ON MY PL4N3T…
W3 H4V3 FOUR D1FF3R3NT K1NDS OF ROM4NC3
FOUR QU4DR4NTS, YOU S33?
TWO OF TH3M 4R3 SORT OF PL4TON1C
1T’D B3 TOO MUCH TO G3T 1NTO TH3M 4LL R1GHT NOW
BUT TH3 ON3S YOU N33D TO KNOW 4BOUT 4R3 R3D ROM4NC3…
WH1CH 1S WH4T NORM4L HUM4NS F33L 4ND WH4T 1 TH1NK YOU’V3 B33N F33L1NG FOR M3…
4ND BL4CK ROM4NC3
WH1CH 1S WH4T 1’V3 B33N F33L1NG FOR YOU
Is that as scary as it sounds…
K1ND OF?
1 DON’T R34LLY KNOW HOW TO D3SCR1B3 1T TO SOM3ON3 WHO D1DN’T GROW UP W1TH 1T
B4S1C4LLY R3D LOV3 1S B4S3D ON H4V1NG N1C3 F33L1NGS 4ND LOV1NG 34CH OTH3R
BUT BL4CK ROM4NC3 1S B4S3D ON H4T1NG 34CH OTH3R!
BUT 1N 4 MOR3 1NT3NS3, FOCUS3D W4Y…
1T’S TWO P3OPL3 H4T1NG 34CH OTH3R TH3 S4M3 W4Y TWO P3OPL3 M1GHT LOV3 34CH OTH3R
4ND BU1LD1NG 4 R3L4T1ONSH1P B4S3D ON TH4T!
Like… an arch rival or something?
SORT OF!
1 GU3SS TH4T’S TH3 CLOS3ST 3QU1V4L3NT
BUT K1ND4 MOR3 SP3C14L TH4N TH4T TOO
WH3N YOU H4V3 BL4CK F33L1NGS FOR SOM3ON3…
TH3Y’R3 C4LL3D YOUR “K1SM3S1S”
1’V3 B33N W4NT1NG TO M4K3 YOU MY K1SM3S1S FOR 4 LONG T1M3 NOW!
1F 1 H4D KNOWN YOU D1DN’T UND3RST4ND WH4T TH4T M34NT…
1 WOULD H4V3 B33N 4 LOT MOR3 UP FRONT 4BOUT MY F33L1NGS
1’M SORRY!
Gosh, this is all so confusing…
Terezi, I’m sorry, I’m trying to understand, but…
I don’t think I can return your feelings.
I like you, but … not in that way?
Er, a hate way?
4WW, 4R3 YOU SUR3?
YOU H4V3N’T F3LT L1K3 YOU H4T3D M3 4T 4LL
NOT ONC3
1N 4LL TH3 T1M3S W3 W3R3 H4NG1NG OUT? >:P
Well… maybe a little, but…
I think it might be something only an alien can feel.
I don’t think it would be very healthy for me to have a “kismesis”...
I can’t even begin to imagine what it would mean to have a “hate romance” with someone!
Anyway… what does all this have to do with my katamari and Pyralspite?
1 SUPPOS3 1 M1GHT 4S W3LL JUST COM3 CL34N...
R3M3MB3R 1 TOLD YOU TH4T PYR4LSP1T3 D1S4PP34R3D ON TH3 V3RY S4M3 N1GHT YOU ROLL3D UP TH3 SCHOOL?
...Oh. I see.
I accidentally rolled up Pyralspite too…
And now he’s locked up in the principal’s office with my katamari.
Is that it?!
WOW! TH4T TOOK YOU FOR3V3R TO F1GUR3 OUT
YOU D3F1N1T3LY DON’T H4V3 COOL M1ND POW3RS L1K3 M3!
So that’s why you were interrogating me about Pyralspite…
And why you wanted me to break my katamari out of the weapons vault.
But… why didn’t you just TELL me that in the first place?!
Why did you have to play these weird games with me?!
B3C4US3, COTTON C4NDY…
B31NG HON3ST 4ND OP3N 4BOUT YOUR F33L1NGS?
TH4T’S SOM3TH1NG YOU DO 1N 4 R3D ROM4NC3
BUT M4N1PUL4T1NG 4ND T3RR1FY1NG 4 P3RSON 1NTO DO1NG WH4T YOU W4NT…
TH4T’S WH4T YOU DO 1N 4 BL4CK ROM4NC3 >:]
Um.
I guess that’s…
Flattering?
...Wow. I don’t think my normal advice applies here.
Pac-Man?!
H-how long have you been standing there?!
TH1S 1S 4 PR1V4T3 CONV3RS4T1ON!!!
Maybe you kids… SHOULDN’T be true to yourselves.
Farewell!
H3H3H3, H3 SM3LLS L1K3 L3MON T4RTS >:]
(Hmm… what did Pac-Man mean by that?
Does he mean… that I should forget what I’ve learned about normal romance…
And embrace Terezi’s way of life…
For a love that crosses the boundaries of space?!
...Er, a “hate”, that is.
I have no idea what to do…
I’m not sure I’m ready for all this…)
